titleStmt.title: The second booke of flowers fruicts beastes birds and flies exactly drawne
Book of flowers fruicts beastes birds and flies exactly drawne. Part 2.
titleStmt.author: Simpson, William, fl. 1635-1646, engraver.

publicationStmt.publisher: And are to bee sold by George Humble at ye white horse in Popes head Ally,

notesStmt.note: A continuation of "A book of flowers fruicts beastes birds and flies exactly drawne", which is known only in an issue from [1661] (Wing B3706 - cancelled in Wing 1994 ed.).
Engraved throughout; title page signed: W: Sempson fecit.
Only known copy lacks leaves g, l, and n.
Imperfect; leaves g, l, and n lacking.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: ye white horse in Popes head Ally
